short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness the captivating heroes of Azur Lane standing side by side, ready for action in a stunning display of unity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sail into a stunning Azur Lane-inspired browsing experience with this captivating theme.

🎨 Minimalist Design: Showcasing Azur Lane girls standing side by side, exuding elegance and strength, with a vivid and dynamic background that complements their iconic designs.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on top of your schedule with a sleek and stylish display inspired by the naval charm of Azur Lane.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate your favorite websites with precision, just like a fleet guided by skilled commanders.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into naval-themed mini-games that echo the excitement and strategy of Azur Lane battles.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast, efficient searches while enjoying a visually immersive and dynamic interface.
🚀 More Extensions: Add features to enhance your browsing experience, capturing the strategic and aesthetic appeal of Azur Lane.
